thread.title: GCU researchers deliver European HAI epidemiology training (Glasgow Caledonian University)
thread.title_full: GCU researchers deliver European HAI epidemiology training (Glasgow Caledonian University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: GCU researchers deliver European HAI epidemiology training (Glasgow Caledonian University)
text: ( Source : Glasgow Caledonian University ) Glasgow Caledonian University ( GCU ) researchers are part of a major European training programme across 28 countries to ensure that hospitals correctly inform the European Centre for Disease Prevention
